alert.note: Alert for Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:23AM EST until January 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Glaze of Ice. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy road conditions into the morning commute. Even though air temperatures have risen into the mid to upper 30s, ground temperatures will be slow to rise above freezing until after daybreak. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
